text: @kanyewest In order to run for President, you have to prove yourself worthy of public office. Make a statement, Black lives Matter, Fight Poverty, Climate Change or COVID19, stand for something, take the lead to prove it! #2020Vision

domain.name: Person

domain.name: Musician
